artist: Artist: Peter Strüb the Younger (Master of Messkirch)
creditline: The Bergmann Richards Memorial Fund and the Fiduciary Fund
markings: verso: foam on back; no labels.
provenance: The Princes of Liechtenstein, Schloss Seebenstein, Vienna, Austria. (Gallery P. de Boer, Amsterdam, The Netherlands by 1964). H. Becker, Dortmund. The Netherlands. (Gallery Hans Cramer, The Hague, The Netherlands by 1975 through 1982); purchased by MIA in 1982.
title: The Elevation of the Magdalene or of St. Mary of Egypt
